'Many' is a town in and the parish seat of Sabine Parish, Louisiana, United
States. The population was 2,706 at the 2000 census (a decrease of 183 from the
2000 Census). The town was named for James B. Many, the commander of nearby
Fort Jesup.
categories: Populated places in Sabine Parish, Louisiana
